title: Paws for Thought: How animals enrich our lives
description: From Back Cover: Paws for Thought is filled with real-life stories from friends of the National Humane Education Society who have rescued, cared for, and loved God's precious creatures. It's about the important work each of us does to improve the fate of homeless, sick and abused animals. And it's about the wonderful ways animals can enrich our lives. Most of all, this book is a celebration of the warm, loving relationships between humans and animals of all kinds. The book you are holding in your hands could make a difference in the lives of many abandoned animals in the future. Share it with you family and friends, so they, too, can learn the joys and delights of proper stewardship of animals!
author: Anna C. Briggs
